name: Border Catz Escape
description:
How To Play:

The big Building in the middle is your main building. Click there to convert worker Catz to Explorers/Warriors/Party Planners.

LEFTCLICK on Fishfarm/Solarium/Woolfarm to collect resources with workers. RIGHTCLICK on Fishfarm/Solarium/Woolfarm to send workers BACK to base.

Catnip (Icon on the left): Makes your Catz happy! Use it

Click the Quest Button to see Main Quest

The" Explore Button" can only be clicked if you got an explorer in the Base.

The" Raid Button" can only be clicked if you gota warrior in the Base.

To Finish a Quest you need the resources named in the quest and the Catz (Worker,Explorer,Warrior,Partyplaner) INSIDE your Main Building. 

Background Story: You lead a small Group of Catz, which fled from climate change! You old home country is nothing but a dessert and finally you reached a rich, green country. But now a flood is coming to you!

Save your Catz by doing your main quests!
